message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper is about improving sequence modeling using a new family of models called Lattice Recurrent Units (LRU). The paper focuses on language modeling and evaluates the performance of LRU on four publicly-available datasets. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses the computational convergence rates and statistical efficiency of LRU, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper uses language modeling as an application, which could also suggest that it belongs to cs.CV (Computer Vision) since language is often used as a modality in computer vision tasks.
